ai-kv17.1:0.4_0: Discussion of the noble ones made of merit.
ai-kv17.1:1.7_0: and there is no merit for the perfected ones.
ai-kv17.1:2.3_0: by perfected ones, bad deeds. Completely makes the imperturbable choice. They fall into the imperturbable choice. Whatever bodily, verbal deeds, or mental deeds they undertake in line with authority.
ai-kv17.1:3.9_0: You’re perfected ones, fully awakened Buddhas.
ai-kv17.1:3.10_0: You’re perfected ones, but have vanquished.
ai-kv17.1:3.14_0: but remain after getting rid of them?
ai-kv17.1:3.16_0: but remain after getting rid of them.
ai-kv17.1:4.1_0: Do they neither give up nor grasp, but remain after giving them up? They neither discard things nor amass them, but remain after discarding them. They neither dissipate things nor get clouded by them, but remain after dissipating them?
ai-kv17.1:4.3_0: And they neither dissipate nor get clouded by, but remain after dissipating them.
ai-kv17.1:5.1_0: and there is no merit for the perfected ones.
ai-kv17.1:5.3_0: And a perfected one gives what’s gifts to the perfected ones.
ai-kv17.1:5.5_0: Danger, perfected ones give gifts to Revata, but not the proper conduct.
ai-kv17.1:5.6_0: “There is no merit for the perfected one.”
ai-kv17.1:6.1_0: He should give robe-cloth to a perfected one.
ai-kv17.1:6.4_0: medicines and supplies for the sick ...
ai-kv17.1:6.10_0: keeps it connected with a smell ...
ai-kv17.1:6.14_0: If they can’t fall into the A perfected one, but Revata would not proceed having turned away,
ai-kv17.1:6.15_0: “There is no merit for the perfected one.”
ai-kv17.1:6.16_0: The discussion of the perfected ones is finished.
